property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Draw 1 card for each kick attack in your card pool. Your Combat Phase ends. E Commit 1 foundation: Your kick attack gets +1 speed for each kick attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +2 speed for every other attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an ability that adds any number of cards to either player's momentum, cancel its effects. E: Your attack gets +1 speed for each non-attack card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add 1 non-attack card from your card pool to your momentum. Only playable if you have at least 1 kick attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: {All} Combo E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 printed low kick from your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: {Life} Combo E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 printed high kick from your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: {Water} Combo E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 printed mid kick from your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 other card from your card pool to your momentum and then discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +1 damage for each kick attack you played this turn. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Take any revealed kick cards and add them to your hand. Discard any other cards revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next kick attack this turn gets Multiple: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Look at the top X cards of your deck and rearrange them in any order. X equals the number of kick attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, reveal your hand: If you revealed at least 2 kick cards, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 card: Discard up to 2 action cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this turn, your kick attacks get +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -X damage or -X speed (your choice). X equals the number of cards in your opponent's card pool that share a keyword with this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your kick attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: For the rest of this turn, after your kick attack deals damage, your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 character card from your staging area, remove all non-character cards in your staging area from the game: Destroy all non-character cards in your opponent's staging area. E Discard 1 card: Your attack gets +X speed and +X damage. X equals the number of characters in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack deals damage, choose and destroy 1 of your opponent's foundations or assets. Then, your opponent chooses and destroys 1 of your foundations or assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo F: Destroy 3 non-character cards in your opponent's staging area. E: Your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Combo (Mid Attack, Low Attack, High Attack)

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your punch attack deals damage, take the top 2 cards of your deck and add them to your momentum. Kazuya E Destroy this asset: If your attack deals damage, destroy 1 card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Your opponent may not play enhance abilities printed on foundations during thie rest of your attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Powerful: 3. E Destroy 1 foundation: Your opponent may not play abilities printed on their character during this attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand. Each multiple copy of this attack also gains this enhance ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Multiple: 1. Each multiple copy of this attack gains the throw keyword.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of character cards in play. E Discard 1 card: This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays an ehnace ability printed on a card in their staging area, you may discard this card from your card pool to cancel that ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After you take 4 or more damage due to your opponent's attack, your opponent must choose and destroy 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, lose 2 vitality: After you play an ability that destroys a foundation as a cost, add the destroyed foundation to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 character card: Your attack gets +4 damage. E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, take the top card of your deck and add it face down to your staging area. That card is considered a foundation with a blank text box. 'G:M' R Destroy this foundation: After an attack is played, it gets +1 or -1 to all the card's keyword ratings (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready, after you block your opponent's attack with a character card, if that character card shares the same name as your starting character, immediately add it to your staging area. R Commit: After you play a character card, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, take the top card of your deck and add it to your momentum. E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets Stun: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Take 1 character card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, reveal your hand: If you did not reveal a throw card, you may take 1 throw with a printed difficulty of 5 or less from your discard pile and play it (no control check necessary). E: If your attack deals damage, discard 1 of your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Both players make a control check. If your control check is higher than your opponent's, then your attack gets +X damage. X equals the control value of your checked card. E: Both players make a control check. IF your control check is higher than your opponent's, then this attack gets -X damage. X equals the control value of your checked card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your throw attack deals damage, take 1 throw attack with a printed difficulty less than the damage dealt from your discard pile, and add it to your hand. Discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Take 1 throw attack with a printed difficulty of 4 or less from your discard pile and add it to your hand. E: Your throw attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -X difficulty. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next throw attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Take 1 throw from your discard pile and add it to your hand. E: If this attack deals damage, the damage of your next throw attack this turn cannot be reduced by card effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your control checks to play attacks cannot be modified by card effects. E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets Stun: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent draws 1 less card during their next Draw Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent's hand size is permanetly reduced by 1. Only playable if your opponent's hand size is greater than yours. E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent draws 2 less cards during their next Draw Step. Only playable if your opponent's hand size is greater than yours.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Throw - King Combo (High Throw, Mid Throw)

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent makes a control check. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the control value of your opponent's checked card. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): If your attack deals damage, discard 1 of your opponent's momentum. E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the total amount of momentum your opponent has discarded this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Desperation E: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If your attack deals damage, your opponent draws 1 less card during their next draw step. E Commit: Your throw attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your throw attack gets +2 damage. {Earth} E Commit: This attack gets -3 damage (minimum 1). Only playable if your opponent's printed hand size is greater than yours.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage. If this attack deals damage, the next attack played this turn gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your Draw Step begins, draw no cards during your Draw Step. Your attacks get +2 damage for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): This attack gets -X damage. X equals the total amount of momentum your opponent has discarded this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. Choose 1 card and add it to their discard pile. Add the rest of the cards back to the top of your opponent's deck in any order. Only playable once per turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an attack, name a card. Your opponent reveals their hand and discards all copies of the named card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove this card from the game: Name a card. Search your opponent's deck for 1 copy of the named card and remove it from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit: Name a card. For the rest of this turn, if your opponent attempts to play the named card from their hand, they must discard 1 card as an additional cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Name a card. Your opponent reveals their hand and discards all copies of the named card. Only playable if your opponent has at least 4 cards in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, name a card. Your opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If the revealed card shares the same name as the named card, remove that card from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent reveals their hand. Take 1 of the revealed cards and add it to the top of your opponent's deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent discards 1 card. {Void} E: If this attack deals damage, name a card. Your opponent reveals their hand and discards all copies of the named card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order. Combo E (6+): This attack is unblockable. Only playable if your opponent has more cards in their removed from game pile than you have in your removed from game pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: When attempting to block your opponent's attack, you may attempt to block with the top card of your discard pile instead of playing a card from your hand (following all restrictions and paying all costs).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Both players discard 1 card. R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack, both players discard 2 momentum and cannot add any cards to momentum during this attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that reveals either player's hand or the top of either player's deck, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Remove 1 card in either player's card pool that was played as a block from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation and discard 1 card from your card pool that was played as a block: Your opponent's attack gets -2 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards. Only playable if your opponent has 4 or more cards in hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 non-character card in your staging area: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difficulty of the committed card. R: After you play a stun ability, commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area. Only playable once per turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack deals damage, reveal your hand. Draw 1 card for each non-block card revealed this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: {Fire} Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of committed cards in your opponent's staging area. E: This attack gets -4 damage. Only playable if you have more committed foundations in your staging area than your opponent has in theirs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Paul Only E Commit: Your attack gets Stun: 2. {All} E Commit: If this attack deals damage, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the PRINTED block modifer of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Commit 2 foundations: This attack gets Stun: 3. E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total of all stun ratings on cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +4 damage. E: This attack gets +3 speed. Your opponent may commit 1 foundation to cancel this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 damage. Your opponent may commit 1 foundation to cancel this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -X difficulty. X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area. E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 to its stun rating.

card.name: It's Got to be the Hair

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, reveal your hand: Your attack gets +1 damage for each non-block card revealed. Your opponent may commit 2 foundations to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage. Your opponent may destroy 1 of their foundations to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation, discard 1 block card: This attack gets -X damage. X equals the PRINTED block modifier of the discarded card. E Commit 1 foundation, discard 1 block card: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the PRINTED block modifier of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent may discard 1 card to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before you make a control check to play an attack, that check gets +2. Your opponent may commit 2 foundations to cancel this effect and destroy this foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 1 foundation: Add 1 card in your hand to the top of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your stun attack gets +1 to its stun rating. E Commit: Your stun attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum. Then you add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your staging area face down. For the rest of this turn these face down cards are considered to be foundations with blank text boxes. At the end of this turn, remove these face down cards from the game. Only playable if you have less foundations in your staging area than your opponent has in theirs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Name a card and reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a copy of the named card, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your punch attack gets +2 speed. E Commit: Your punch attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your opponent's card effect, draw 2 cards. F Commit 1 foundation: Reveal the top card of both player's decks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that destroys an asset, cancel its effects and destroy 1 asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Multiple: 2. Each multiple copy of this card gets the punch keyword. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage for each punch attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Multiple: 1. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 speed for each kick attack in your card pool. This attack's multiple copies also get this enhance ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your opponent's card effect, play this attack (no control check necessary). E: This attack gets Stun: 2. Only playable during your opponent's turn.
